channel.title: Cthulhu Dark Green: St Vitus Dance (Scenario Playtest)
channel.description:
London during the second summer of love 1989 The mangled body of an Italian exchange student in old fashioned automobilist clothes is recovered from a fatal car crash. The driver’s body and his car show disturbing altercations. Section 3 sends agents to investigate.
![D-6xhw4U8AIQ42s|355x500](upload://d76XOdcghY7cZF7cn5LtoXo52ZI.jpeg) Cthulhu Dark Green is written by Justin Ford and based on Cthulhu Dark by Graham Walmsley.
The session will last for approximately 3.5 to 4 hours with some time reserved for feedback if you like. The session will be recorded if everyone is in agreement.
The game may contain themes of mental illness, body horror, sex and violence. We will be using the X-Card.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play.
[date=2019-09-21 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2019-09-21 time=22:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]

The mangled body of an Italian exchange student in old fashioned automobilist clothes is recovered from a fatal car crash. The driver’s body and his car show disturbing altercations.
Section 3 sends agents to investigate.

Cthulhu Dark Green is written by Justin Ford and based on Cthulhu Dark by Graham Walmsley.

The session will last for approximately 3.5 to 4 hours with some time reserved for feedback if you like. The session will be recorded if everyone is in agreement.
